file_content.text: The dark ones' power tempers our blade. Soon we will sever the bars on our cage.
An abomination pollutes us!
Abominations pollute us!
Make a wall of fire and steel!
I am Heart Rend. The dark ones are my treasure. Their torrent of fear will shatter our tomb.
Let the Dread Masters go. I won't ask a second time.
Release them at once.
The Dread Masters are worth more than your entire species. Don't make me destroy you.
Touch them and suffer.
The Dread Masters have an appointment with the Emperor. Let them go.
The Sith are coming with me.
Lay one mutated hand on the Dread Masters, and you'll answer to me.
Those Sith are mine.
You are poison. The dark ones too. Their dread will begin the cleansing.
The Dread Masters can't be bullied. They will destroy you first.
They'll never help you escape.
The dark ones have no choice.
They aren't worth dying over.
Peace spills from your face, but blood stains your hands. The dark ones are lost to you.
Our High Savants already whisper in their deaf ears. Spinning webs that stick to the mind.
Open your eyes, dark ones! Cleanse the abominations!
